title: Unreleased Shimano GRX and new bikes from Canyon and Santa Cruz spotted at Unbound Gravel 2023
content:
A new Shimano GRX drivetrain, Canyon Grail, and Santa Cruz Stigmata gravel bikes spotted under the winners of Unbound Gravel 2023.

Read the full article at Unreleased Shimano GRX and new bikes from Canyon and Santa Cruz spotted at Unbound Gravel 2023 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
